subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets frittered away three separate four-run leads in their latest loss while the Phillies won their sixth straight game and now trail the Mets by only a game and a half in the N.L. East.
snippet: The Mets frittered away three separate four-run leads in their latest loss while the Phillies won their sixth straight game and now trail the Mets by only a game and a half in the N.L. East.
